channel.title: Comments on: WordCamp Utah Registration Is Now Open

item.title: By: I’m Speaking At WordCamp Utah | Ash Buckles
item.dc:creator: I’m Speaking At WordCamp Utah | Ash Buckles
item.description: [...] Anyway, the purpose of this post is not to convince you to blog using Wordpress - you should know that by now. I’m writing to tell you that I’ve been asked to speak at WordCamp Utah. Additional information is available from Joseph Scott. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Anyway, the purpose of this post is not to convince you to blog using WordPress – you should know that by now. I’m writing to tell you that I’ve been asked to speak at WordCamp Utah. Additional information is available from Joseph Scott. […]

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Utah Attorney -
I'd describe it as both a good opportunity get together with other WordPress users/bloggers and learn more about WordPress on different levels. There are sessions on future of WordPress, good design and plugin development.
item.content:encoded:
@Utah Attorney –

I’d describe it as both a good opportunity get together with other WordPress users/bloggers and learn more about WordPress on different levels. There are sessions on future of WordPress, good design and plugin development.

item.title: By: WordCamp Utah Registration Is Now Open - Joseph Scotts Blog Writer River

item.description: [...] WordCamp Utah Registration Is Now Open - Joseph Scotts Blog. No doubt WordCamp Utah may not be geographically relevant to you, but there are WordCamps throughout the world. item.title: By: Utah Attorney
item.dc:creator: Utah Attorney
item.description: I'm a new WordPress user that would like to get more involved in the community. What is the general purpose of WordCamp? Just a get-together or educational?
item.content:encoded: I’m a new WordPress user that would like to get more involved in the community. What is the general purpose of WordCamp? Just a get-together or educational?
